# zitadel_default_security_settings (Resource)

Resource representing the default security settings.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "zitadel_default_security_settings" "default" {
  enable_impersonation = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `enable_impersonation` (Boolean) Enable impersonation for the instance

### Optional

- `embedded_iframe_allowed_origins` (Set of String) Origins allowed to embed ZITADEL in an iframe
- `embedded_iframe_enabled` (Boolean) Enable embedding in iframes

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

## Import

```bash
terraform import zitadel_default_security_settings.default ""
```
